page.title: 02PRINCIPAL FEATURES
page.content: { THE ESTUARY}A lot of our area is sea, part of Morecambe Bay.There are several rivers draining into the estuary, the biggest are the Crake and the Leven. {BIRKRIGG COMMON}This is a place where you can play games and sledge in the winter.It is made of limestone and the slabs form a limestone pavement.It is rough grazing land with many sheep. {CROFTLANDS ESTATE}was started about 30 years ago and has grown over the years.Our school is on the estate and was built 23 years ago.People are constantly moving in and out of the houses and bungalows. { {CONISHEAD PRIORY}It was orginally founded in 1160 as a hospital for the poor and lepers,owned by the Order of St.Augustine.It is now owned by the Manjushri Institute.It is a centre for Buddhist studies.
